meanings.definition: The act of reducing the quality or value of something.
meanings.sent1: The debasement of the painting occurred when it was accidentally torn.
meanings.sent2: The debasement of the currency led to inflation.
meanings.sent3: The debasement of the cake's taste was due to too much salt.
meanings.sent4: Her debasement of his reputation was like a stain that couldn't be removed.
meanings.sent5: The debasement of the diamond's value was evident after it was found to be fake.

meanings.definition: The state of being lowered in quality or value.
meanings.sent1: The debasement of the product was noticeable in its poor packaging.
meanings.sent2: Living in debasement made him strive for improvement.
meanings.sent3: The debasement of the joke's humor made everyone laugh even harder.
meanings.sent4: Her debasement of confidence was like a dark cloud following her everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The debasement of the neighborhood's reputation affected property prices.
